Info.Description: Generates a value noise, which is a type of noise consisting of smooth random values at a grid of points. It creates an organic and less uniform pattern of noise that can be used for creating textures and backgrounds.

Properties.Name: Scale
Properties.Summary: Adjusts the size of the noise pattern. A larger scale increases the size of the features in the noise, creating fewer but larger areas of color. A smaller scale decreases the feature size, resulting in a more detailed noise pattern with more, smaller areas of color.

Properties.Name: Gradient
Properties.Summary: Selects the colors that will be used in the Value noise. The gradient is interpolated over the grayscale noise values. Each point in the noise pattern is assigned a color from the gradient based on its value, with low values taking colors from one end of the gradient and high values from the other end.
